songs.lyrics:
When you're lonely i'll be there for you
When you need me i will care for you x4

Girl just follow your heart
Follow it far
If you see something in me, go for it
If you see me bleeding, bandage it
I'm tired of being people's advantages
I had a seed that helped me grow cuz i planted it

Aye, yuh
I shoulda known from the start
You found me right in the dark
You lit me up, you my star
Girl, i wanna give you my heart
Baby, i can feel it in my soul, uh
We relationship goals, uh
Ion even need hoes, uh
They don't even come to shows, uh
songs.title: Follow
